entry.name: dualCameraMode

enum.value: OFF (default) Dual camera mode is off.
ON Dual camera mode is on

entry.details: When ON, the camera HAL can support dual camera mode.

entry.name: availableDualCameraMode
entry.details: OFF Dual camera mode is off. ON Dual camera mode is on.

entry.name: availableExtensions

enum.value: STATISTICS camera extension supports statistics analisys
CV camera extension supports computer vision
ENHANCEMENT camera extension supports image enhancement, eg saturation
DEVICE camera extension supports special features in device,eg dual video

entry.details: The empty list means no camera extension support
